events.message: The customer reported a car collision on the highway, filing the initial claim and providing basic accident details for assessment.
Claim classified under Auto Accident after reviewing customer report and verifying the involvement of the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case promptly to assist the customer through the claims process and next steps.
Customer received formal acknowledgment of claim receipt along with an explanation of the process and expected timelines.
Additional documentation requested from the customer, including photos of vehicle damage and the police accident report.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photographs and official police documentation for claim verification.
Claims team began a formal investigation to assess the damage and validate the circumstances surrounding the vehicle accident.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of claim legitimacy and assessment of repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
Settlement offer proposed to the customer detailing reimbursement amount, repair coverage, and applicable deductibles.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and gratitude for clear communication throughout the claims process.
Official approval granted for the settlement amount, authorizing payment disbursement and vehicle repair.
Payment processed and issued to the customerâ€™s preferred bank account covering the approved repair costs.
The claim was officially closed following successful payment disbursal and confirmation from the customer.
All claim materials and documentation archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
